Class ExtraHealthEffect

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.Effect
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.ExtraHealthEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Tickable
public class ExtraHealthEffect extends Effect
ExtraHealthEffect temporarily increases the maximum health of an entity. Once removed, the entity's health is restored to its original value.
See Also:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyEffect()
    Applies the extra health effect by increasing the target's maximum health.
    Effect
    clone()
    Creates a copy of the current ExtraHealthEffect with the same configuration but no target.
    void
    removeEffect()
    Removes the effect, restoring the target's maximum health to its original value.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExtraHealthEffect

      public ExtraHealthEffect(int level, boolean isFinite, float duration, float remainingTime, Entity target)
      Constructs a new ExtraHealthEffect with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      level - the effect level; each level adds one extra health point
      isFinite - whether the effect has a limited duration
      duration - the total duration of the effect
      remainingTime - the remaining time until the effect expires
      target - the entity that receives the effect

  • Method Details

      public Effect clone()
      Creates a copy of the current ExtraHealthEffect with the same configuration but no target.

      Returns:
      a cloned ExtraHealthEffect
